songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Ma euta andho, chahal pahal ma lattu
Sathibhai le mauka ma faida uthaye bharpur
K teipani ma hunchhu hola sakshyam
Kina dekhidai chha ma ma pagalpan ko lakshyan
K ma afno hak ko lagi pani naladu
Lajja rah ghrina lagdo samaj ma kasari namaru
Janme dekhi haat khutta mero badiyeko
Bachna na paye pani sapna thiyo sachiyeko
Paraye sanga bachnu parchha bhanchan
Tara yaha tah afno bata afnai marchhan
Hey aama ma yo kasto geet gaudaichhu
Thakit vayera swarga ko dhoka dakdakaudaichhu
Soch bichar garchhu ma bich ma haraudina
J satye ho tyehi bolchhu ma sidha daraudina
Matra bhagwan le nikalne chhan sabai niskarsha
Narau yedi maile gare Aryaghat ko sparsha

[Chorus] x2
Narau timi yedi mero sariir aago ma rankada
Chiso luga lagayera malami ma farkada
Malai tah dherai tada janu chha
Saano duniya ma eklai haraunu chha

[Verse 2]
Yo kunai ladai hoen sangarsha ho
Prayatna pani hoen fal prasansha ko
Yo ho ek thakit yuwa ko ikshya
Pugisakyo jaslai thichomicho rah irshya
Andho samajma ratando ko bakwas
Dherai bhoko pet haru chhaina yaha kapas
Chhaina gharbar tara thadinchha durbar
Kehi hunechhaina aawos jo sukai ko sarkar
Ramro padai huna ghumna pardaina sansar
Euta magne le ni dina sakchha sikshya
Huna parchha ikshya, aakha aghi nai chha bidhya
Soch nai ho suruwat, khoj nai ho guruba
Hamro pani dosh chha yaha thos bhalai nahunu ma
Uchai na chunu ma, malai kehi ma garba chhaina
Marnu maarnu bahek hamro ma kunai parba chhaina
Yesari bachnu vanda tah marnu ma kunai lajja chhaina

[Chorus] x2
Narau timi yedi mero sariir aago ma rankada
Chiso luga lagayera malami ma farkada
Malai tah dherai tada janu chha
Saano duniya ma eklai haraunu chha
songs.title: Narunu Timi
